definition: to produce (from sth else)/to derive (from raw material)/derivative
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Derivative lawsuit for the shareholders stem from the UK-US legal system.
sentences.chinese: 股東派生訴訟起源於英美法系。

sentences.english: English has a lot of words which are made by composition and derivation.
sentences.chinese: 英語有大量的合成詞和派生詞。

sentences.english: A fork branches out to two or more parallel paths.
sentences.chinese: 派生可分出兩個或多個並行路徑。

sentences.english: The new derived classes should be able to replace the base classes without any change in the code.
sentences.chinese: 新的派生類應該能夠替換基礎類而無需修改代碼。

sentences.english: So how could we modify behavior of these classes from the derived project side?
sentences.chinese: 那我們如何在派生項目裏修改這些類的行爲呢？

sentences.english: Another example for derivation is when you use an extension without an abstract type.
sentences.chinese: 另一個派生的示例是使用不帶抽象類型的擴展。

sentences.english: This word is a derivative. Can you point out its root?
sentences.chinese: 這是個派生詞，你能指出它的詞根嗎？

sentences.english: The derived classes have the same dynamic class attributes of the base class.
sentences.chinese: 派生類具有跟基類相同的動態類屬性。

sentences.english: The largely unregulated market in derivatives is estimated at 6 hundred trillion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 在派生物中最大的缺乏監管的市場估計有6萬億美元。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 is with the prefix "a" analysis of derivative word recognition.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是對帶前綴“阿”的派生詞的識別分析。

sentences.english: Derived types must be completely substitutable for their base types.
sentences.chinese: 派生類型必須是它們的基礎類型完全可替換的。

sentences.english: Poesy on Chinese painting is a kind of typical derivation of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 題畫詩是一種典型的中國文化的派生物。

sentences.english: As you can see, the Interest Paid is also a derived measure.
sentences.chinese: 正如您可以看到的，所付利息也是派生的測度。

sentences.english: As the example shows, derived-to-base class conversions are also allowed.
sentences.chinese: 如上例所示，派生類至基類的轉換也是允許的。

sentences.english: Chapter Two is about the derivatives of eponyms.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是關於名祖名詞的派生詞。

sentences.english: Plug-ins link with this assembly so they can derive from your interface. For example, see the following code in C
sentences.chinese: 插件與該程序集鏈接，於是他們從你提供的接口派生。

definition: to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
to evolve (of ideas, designs, constructions etc)/to develop and change
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
